hero.title: Hi, I'm Ali Al-Zuhairi
hero.subtitle: AI-driven product designer and product owner specializing in prompt engineering — transforming complex challenges into intelligent, inclusive digital solutions that bridge human creativity and artificial intelligence.

about.title: Crafting Digital Dreams into Reality
about.intro: Hey there! I'm Ali, a designer who uses AI as a powerful tool to unlock new levels of creativity. From Damascus to Helsinki, my journey has taught me that great design happens at the intersection of human intuition and intelligent technology. By integrating AI into my process, I explore fresh ideas, solve complex problems, and craft experiences that are both meaningful and accessible.
about.quote: At the intersection of human creativity and AI innovation — where precision prompt engineering meets visionary design.
about.second: In the past couple of years, as AI technologies rapidly emerged, I was among the early adopters—eager to experiment and integrate them into real-world design workflows. I've specialized in using prompt engineering to bring digital products to life, making AI feel more human, more accessible, and vastly more powerful through intentional design and strategic interaction.
about.third: When I'm not designing with AI, you'll find me experimenting with new AI tools, crafting precise prompts that unlock creative possibilities, or mentoring others on how to leverage artificial intelligence for better design outcomes.

collaboration.title: Collaboration Workflow Platform
collaboration.intro: At the heart of the Collaboration Workflow Platform is a commitment to creativity, interconnectivity, and real-time teamwork. This platform is designed to simplify live collaboration, improve communication, and help teams deliver content more efficiently across devices, time zones, and locations.

designProcess.title: Design Process
designProcess.discoverDesc: Research user needs and pain points
designProcess.defineDesc: Analyze insights to scope the challenge

jobseeking.title: Job Seeking Application
jobseeking.intro: A mobile app designed to streamline job searches—especially for local, part-time, and weekend work. Created to make job hunting faster, easier, and more efficient for people seeking additional income opportunities.

blogPage.title: Blog & Insights
blogPage.description: Thoughts, learnings, and perspectives on design leadership, product management, and the intersection of creativity and technology.

promptsPage.subtitle: A collection of prompts I've crafted for various creative AI tools
